mapper.select:
select id, pname, imgpath, createtime, fenleiid, jiage, tuijian, miaoshu
from t_product where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_product(pname, imgpath, createtime, fenleiid, jiage, tuijian, miaoshu) values (#{pname}, #{imgpath}, #{createtime}, #{fenleiid}, #{jiage}, #{tuijian}, #{miaoshu})

insert into t_product(pname, imgpath, createtime, fenleiid, jiage, tuijian, miaoshu) values
(#{entity.pname}, #{entity.imgpath}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.fenleiid}, #{entity.jiage}, #{entity.tuijian}, #{entity.miaoshu})

insert into t_product(pname, imgpath, createtime, fenleiid, jiage, tuijian, miaoshu) values
(#{entity.pname}, #{entity.imgpath}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.fenleiid}, #{entity.jiage}, #{entity.tuijian}, #{entity.miaoshu})
on duplicate key update pname = values(pname), imgpath = values(imgpath), createtime = values(createtime), fenleiid = values(fenleiid), jiage = values(jiage), tuijian = values(tuijian), miaoshu = values(miaoshu)
mapper.update:
update t_product
pname = #{pname},
imgpath = #{imgpath},
createtime = #{createtime},
fenleiid = #{fenleiid},
jiage = #{jiage},
tuijian = #{tuijian},
miaoshu = #{miaoshu},
where id = #{id}
